<div class="section-title" markdown="1">
## Publications
</div>

One of the main goals of the Microservices Community is to disseminate knowledge; supporting experts and researchers in meeting, presenting their experiences and ideas, and discussing them within the community.

This page contains a collection of peer-review scientific papers published with the support of the Microservices Community.

Legend: 
<span class="pub_type_icon open_access"></span>
<span class="description">Open Access</span>
<span class="divider">|</span>
<span class="pub_type_icon grey_literature"></span>
<span class="description">Grey Literature</span>
<span class="divider">|</span>
<span class="pub_type_icon academic_literature"></span>
<span class="description">Academic Literature <br style="display: block;margin-top:-13px;content:'';margin-bottom:-13px;"> (also peer-reviewed)</span>

Peer Reviewed
